Title: Verify Sign Up Modal Opens
Description: Verify that clicking Sign up opens registration modal
Steps: 1. Click "Sign up" link 2. Observe modal
Expected Result: Registration modal opens with username and password fields

Title: Verify User Registration - Valid Data
Description: Verify that user can register with valid username and password

Steps: 1. Click "Sign up" 2. Enter unique username (e.g.
Expected Result: testuser123) 3. Enter password (e.g.
Type: Registration is successful and confirmation message is displayed

Title: Verify User Registration - Empty Fields
Description: Verify that registration form validates empty fields
Precondition: User is on sign up modal
Steps: 1. Click "Sign up" 2. Leave username empty 3. Leave password empty 4. Click "Sign up" button
Expected Result: Validation error is displayed for empty fields

Title: Verify User Registration - Duplicate Username
Description: Verify that duplicate username registration is prevented
Precondition: User attempts to register with existing username
Steps: 1. Click "Sign up" 2. Enter existing username 3. Enter password 4. Click "Sign up" button
Expected Result: Error message indicates username already exists

Title: Verify Login Modal Opens
Description: Verify that clicking Log in opens login modal
Steps: 1. Click "Log in" link 2. Observe modal
Expected Result: Login modal opens with username and password fields

Title: Verify User Login - Valid Credentials
Description: Verify that user can log in with valid credentials
Steps: 1. Click "Log in" 2. Enter valid username 3. Enter valid password 4. Click "Log in" button
Expected Result: Login is successful and navigation updates (shows "Log out")

Title: Verify User Login - Invalid Username
Description: Verify that login fails with invalid username
Steps: 1. Click "Log in" 2. Enter invalid username 3. Enter any password 4. Click "Log in" button
Expected Result: Error message indicates invalid credentials

Title: Verify User Login - Invalid Password
Description: Verify that login fails with invalid password
Steps: 1. Click "Log in" 2. Enter valid username 3. Enter invalid password 4. Click "Log in" button
Expected Result: Error message indicates invalid credentials

Title: Verify User Logout
Description: Verify that user can log out successfully
Steps: 1. Click "Log out" link 2. Verify navigation updates
Expected Result: User is logged out and navigation shows "Log in"

Title: Verify Place Order Button Availability
Description: Verify that Place Order button is available when cart has items
Steps: 1. Add product to cart 2. Navigate to cart page 3. Verify Place Order button
Expected Result: Place Order button is present and clickable

Title: Verify Order Form Opens
Description: Verify that clicking Place Order opens order form
Precondition: User is on cart page with items
Steps: 1. Click "Place Order" button 2. Observe order form
Expected Result: Order form modal opens with all required fields

Title: Verify Order Form Fields
Description: Verify that order form has all required fields
Steps: 1. Open order form 2. Verify fields
Expected Result: Order form displays: Name

Title: Verify Place Order - Valid Data
Description: Verify that order can be placed with valid data
Precondition: User is on order form with items in cart
Steps: 1. Fill Name: "John Doe" 2. Fill Country: "USA" 3. Fill City: "New York" 4. Fill Credit card: "1234567890123456" 5. Fill Month: "12" 6. Fill Year: "2025" 7. Click "Purchase"
Expected Result: Order is placed successfully and confirmation is displayed

Title: Verify Order Form Validation - Empty Name
Description: Verify that empty Name field shows validation error
Steps: 1. Leave Name field empty 2. Fill other fields 3. Click "Purchase"
Expected Result: Validation error is displayed for Name field

Title: Verify Order Form Validation - Empty Credit Card
Description: Verify that empty Credit card field shows validation error
Steps: 1. Fill all fields except Credit card 2. Leave Credit card empty 3. Click "Purchase"
Expected Result: Validation error is displayed for Credit card field

Title: Verify Order Form Validation - Invalid Credit Card Format
Description: Verify that invalid credit card format is rejected
Steps: 1. Fill all fields 2. Enter invalid credit card (e.g.
Expected Result: "abc123") 3. Click "Purchase"
Priority: Validation error indicates invalid credit card format

Title: Verify Cart Cleared After Order
Description: Verify that cart is cleared after successful order placement
Steps: 1. Place order successfully 2. Navigate to cart page
Expected Result: Cart is empty after order placement

Description: Verify that product pages load within 2 seconds

Expected Result: Product page loads within 2 seconds

Title: Verify Cart Page Load Time
Description: Verify that cart page loads within 2 seconds
Steps: 1. Add items to cart 2. Navigate to cart page 3. Measure load time
Expected Result: Cart page loads within 2 seconds

Title: Verify Add to Cart Response Time
Description: Verify that add to cart action completes within 1 second
Precondition: User is on product detail page
Steps: 1. Click "Add to cart" 2. Measure response time
Expected Result: Add to cart action completes within 1 second

Steps: 1. Enter SQL injection payload: ' OR '1'='1 in username field 2. Submit form 3. Verify behavior
Expected Result: SQL injection does not succeed

Title: Verify Password Field Masking

Precondition: User is on login or signup form
Steps: 1. Enter password in password field 2. Observe password display
Expected Result: Password is masked (shows dots or asterisks)

Title: Verify Session Management
Description: Verify that session tokens are used for authentication
Steps: 1. Log in to application 2. Open browser DevTools 3. Check network requests or cookies
Expected Result: Session token or session ID is present in cookies or requests

Title: Verify Logout Invalidates Session
Description: Verify that logout invalidates user session
Steps: 1. Log in to application 2. Log out 3. Attempt to access protected features (if any)
Expected Result: Session is invalidated after logout

Title: Exploratory Testing - Product Browsing
Description: Explore product browsing and navigation flows
Steps: 1. Explore different ways to browse products 2. Try edge cases 3. Document findings
Expected Result: Identify any usability issues

Title: Exploratory Testing - Cart Functionality
Description: Explore cart functionality and edge cases
Steps: 1. Add various products to cart 2. Try different cart operations 3. Test edge cases (empty cart
Expected Result: large quantities) 4. Document findings
Priority: Identify any cart-related issues or edge cases

Title: Exploratory Testing - Authentication Flows
Description: Explore authentication flows and security
Steps: 1. Test various login/signup scenarios 2. Test session management 3. Test security aspects 4. Document findings
Expected Result: Identify any authentication or security issues

Title: Exploratory Testing - Order Placement
Description: Explore order placement and validation
Steps: 1. Test various order scenarios 2. Test form validation 3. Test edge cases 4. Document findings
Expected Result: Identify any order placement issues or edge cases

Title: Exploratory Testing - Cross-Browser
Description: Explore application behavior across different browsers
Steps: 1. Test same scenarios in different browsers 2. Compare behavior 3. Document differences
Expected Result: Identify any browser-specific issues or inconsistencies
